div.p: [...] Total: [...] 1,500 at a rate of 70 for 4 dr. [85 dr. 4 ob. ...] x5,969 1/6 at a rate of 60 for [4 dr.(?) ...] and in the sandy canal [...] of Protarchos and [Techesteus ...] (as) is written by the [...] [...] Total: x3,576 [...]
Souchos [...] Soknebtynis [...] Sokonopis [...] Remainder: 2,589 Goats: 200 [...] Translation: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 217, Â© Peeters
